text: Róbert Nagy (born 4 November 1972 in Bratislava) is a Slovak former cyclist. ==Major results== ;1999 : 1st Stage 4 Tour of Yugoslavia ;2000 : 1st 20px Road race, National Road Championships ;2001 : 3rd Time trial, National Road Championships ;2002 : 1st Stage 2 Paths of King Nikola : 2nd Road race, National Road Championships : 3rd Overall Grand Prix Cycliste de Gemenc ::1st Stage 2 ;2003 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Road Championships ;2004 : 3rd Time trial, National Road Championships ;2007 : 1st Stage 3 Tour de Hongrie ;2008 : 2nd Time trial, National Road Championships : 3rd Völkermarkter Radsporttage ;2010 : 2nd Overall Paths of King Nikola : 3rd Time trial, National Road Championships ;2011 : 3rd Time trial, National Road Championships : 3rd Central European Tour Miskolc GP ==References== ==External links== * Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak male cyclists Category:Cyclists at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Cyclists at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic cyclists of Slovakia Category:Sportspeople from Bratislava
title: Róbert Nagy (cyclist)
